abstract: Pennsylvania House votes, 170 to 12, to begin impeachment proceedings against Atty Gen Kathleen Kane, who has come under fire for allegedly leaking grand jury information; vote marks latest turn in drama surrounding figure whose attempts to rout out government corruption have turned against her.
lead_paragraph: The impeachment vote by the State House and an effort to oust her by the State Senate were the latest turn in an eye-popping drama involving Attorney General Kathleen Kane.

headline.main: Pennsylvania to Start Impeachment Proceedings for Attorney General
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania to Start Impeachment Proceedings for Attorney General

snippet: The impeachment vote by the State House and an effort to oust her by the State Senate were the latest turn in an eye-popping drama involving Attorney General Kathleen Kane.
